screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .filebolt file in Envault Filebolt 1.2
screenshot.caption: FILEBOLT file open in Envault Filebolt 1.2

description: FILEBOLT files can only be opened by the Filebolt app. To open a FILEBOLT file, simply drag and drop the file onto the program or select "Open bolted file..." in the left pane of the Filebolt interface.

FILEBOLT files are not only used for securing files stored on your computer. They can be shared with others as long as they have the password the original creator of the FILEBOLT file set to secure the file.

images.caption: FILEBOLT file open in Envault Filebolt 1.2
